title: Introductory Meetup
description: For our first get together we'd like to have an introductory meetup! After an inspiring speech from Murtada, you're welcome to hang out, get to know each other, share your work, and connect with fellow photography enthusiasts.
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: Wandering around Haagse Bos
description: For our November meetup we wanted to embrace the word of the month: Wandering. We'll meet at Caffè Almondo initially to socialize, catch-up, and have a drink. In the first part of the meetup we'll hang out and chat. Afterwards, we'll head out for a photo walk around the neighborhood.
location:
Caffè Almondo
Korte Poten 46
Den Haag

title: Coffee, Chat, and a Walk around Het Park
description: For our monthly meetup, we're going to start at The Tea Lab in Rotterdam to catch up, have some drinks, and chat for a bit. We'd love to hear back from anyone who attended the previous meetups.
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: Contours, Compositions and Cropping
description: Let's kick off the new year with inspiration and creativity at our first meetup of 2025! Join us as Murtada hosts and delivers an engaging short talk on "Contours, Composition, and Creative Framing" to inspire your photography journey this year.
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: Experimental and Manipulated Analog Photography
description: Discover the captivating world of experimental and manipulated analog photography with Kaleigh (@litli_hrafn). In this session, she'll take you through her creative process, sharing techniques and inspiration behind her unique work.

title: Photo Share & Walk around Het Park
description: For March we want to have an open "photo share" day. Pick out one photo (or a small series) that you'd like to share with the group! You can ask for feedback, share the story behind it, or simply show off your work.
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: Nature/Wildlife Photography & Walk around Kralingse Bos
description: Spring is here and we want to take full advantage of the nice weather! We'll gather at restaurant De Tuin in Kralingse Bos and Murtada will give a short photography talk. Afterwards, we'll explore the park together for a photo walk.

title: Mini Meetup: Kralingse Bos
description: Let's explore more of Kralingse Bos together! We'll be starting the walk from De Ster (the windmill) and we'll be doing a counter clockwise circle through the park. Very relaxed pace, perfect for photography.
location:
Plaszoom at The windmill (De ster)
Kralingse Bos
Rotterdam

title: Shadow & Light - Walk to the Japanese Garden
description: This month we're going to have more of a group excursion to enjoy the nice weather. We're going to meet together at the D.E cafe near Den Haag Centraal and then explore the city together, ending at the Japanese garden.
location:
DE Cafe New Babylon
Anna van Buerenplein 3
Den Haag

title: Robert's Experiences at Kodak
description: At this meetup, Robert will be giving a talk about his time at Kodak. After graduating from university, he began his career there and eventually joined the Government Systems Division. Join us for fascinating insights into the world of film photography.
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: Rotterdam Summer Carnival Photo Walk
description: Join us for a vibrant photo walk through the heart of Rotterdam during the legendary Summer Carnival street parade — a dazzling celebration of color, music, and culture. We'll capture the energy and excitement together.
location:
Willem de Kooning Academie
Blaak 10
Rotterdam

title: Spec it, Shoot it, Share it!
description: This meetup is all about creativity, teamwork, and real-world practice. Inspired by spec campaign projects, we'll work together to create compelling photography for a fictional brand or cause. Great opportunity to build your portfolio!
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: Photoshare: Summer Recap!
description: Summer is coming to an end. Many of you have been traveling and exploring (locally and abroad) or just going out to take photos more often during the nice weather, so we thought it would be great to have a meetup to share our summer photography!
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: Surreal Photography
description: Let's explore October's photo challenge prompt together! Often some people express trying to capture moments perfectly - either as they looked in real life or an idealized version. This month we embrace imperfection and see where it takes us creatively.
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: "The Camera in Your Pocket" — Mobile Photography Deep Dive
description: The cameras in our phones can be great tools. Some people in the group have already been making use of it - we've even met some phone-only photographers! However some people might not be getting the most out of their phone cameras. Let's explore together!
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam

title: 2025 Recap
description: For this meetup, we'd like to share a little recap and some highlights from 2025. We will collect some photos from the past photo challenges and meetups to share how everyone has grown and what we've accomplished together as a community.
location:
The Tea Lab
Nieuwe Binnenweg 178 A
Rotterdam
